00006 import newtonERP.module.AbstractEntity;

00008 import newtonERP.orm.associations.AccessorManager;
00009 import newtonERP.orm.field.Field;
00010 import newtonERP.orm.field.Fields;
00011 import newtonERP.orm.field.type.FieldBool;

00019 public class TaskEntity extends AbstractOrmEntity
00020 {
00023         public TaskEntity()
00024         {
00025                 super();
00026                 setVisibleName("Tâche automatisée");
00027                 AccessorManager.addAccessor(this, new Specification());
00028                 AccessorManager.addAccessor(this, new EffectEntity());
00029         }
00030 
00031         @Override
00032         public Fields initFields()
00033         {
00034                 FieldInt specification = new FieldInt("Specification",
00035                                 new Specification().getForeignKeyName());
00036                 specification.setNaturalKey(true);
00037 
00038                 FieldInt effet = new FieldInt("Effet", new EffectEntity()
00039                                 .getForeignKeyName());
00040                 effet.setNaturalKey(true);
00041 
00042                 Vector<Field<?>> fieldList = new Vector<Field<?>>();
00043                 fieldList.add(new FieldInt("Numéro", getPrimaryKeyName()));
00044                 fieldList.add(new FieldBool("Est active", "isActive"));
00045                 fieldList.add(new FieldBool("Recherche directe", "straightSearch"));
00046                 fieldList.add(specification);
00047                 fieldList.add(effet);
00048                 return new Fields(fieldList);
00049         }
00050 
00056         public boolean isSatisfied(Hashtable<String, String> entityParameters,
00057                         boolean isStraightSearch)
00058         {
00059                 return getSpecification().isSatisfied(entityParameters,
00060                                 isStraightSearch);
00061         }
00062 
00063         private Specification getSpecification()
00064         {
00065                 return (Specification) getSingleAccessor(new Specification()
00066                                 .getForeignKeyName());
00067         }
00068 
00075         public AbstractEntity execute(Hashtable<String, String> entityParameters,
00076                         boolean isStraightSearch)
00077         {
00078                 return getEffect().execute(entityParameters, isStraightSearch);
00079         }
00080 
00081         private EffectEntity getEffect()
00082         {
00083                 return (EffectEntity) getSingleAccessor(new EffectEntity()
00084                                 .getForeignKeyName());
00085         }
00086 
00090         public boolean isActive()
00091         {
00092                 return (Boolean) (getData("isActive"));
00093         }
00094 
00098         public boolean isStraightSearch()
00099         {
00100                 return (Boolean) (getData("straightSearch"));
